Package index

All functions

add_linear_regression_formula()
Add Linear Regression Formula (not currently used)
add_watermark()
Function to add a watermark to a ggplot
binary_cat_dist()
Function to generate a binary categorical covariate
calc_summary_stats()
Calculate summary stats with optional rounding
calc_summary_stats_as_list()
Return summary stats as a list
calculate_quantiles()
Function to split a continuous X-variable for a number of quantiles
categorize_outliers()
Function that categorizes outliers relative to a supplied stratification group
categorize_xvar()
Function that categorizes X-axis variable according to the quantile df
cdc.expand
CDC weight-for-age (https://www.cdc.gov/growthcharts/percentile_data_files.htm) Weight-for-age charts, 0 to 20 years, LMS parameters and selected smoothed weight percentiles in kilograms, by sex and age Stature-for-age charts, 0 to 20 years, LMS parameters and selected smoothed weight percentiles in cm, by sex and age Insert citation notes here in the future
check_and_combine_df()
combined 2 datasets for download
check_cov_name()
Function to return a DUMMY name if supplied string is reserved
check_cov_name_duplicate()
Function to check covariate names do not duplicate
check_matrix()
Checks for validity of matrix
code_preamble
Code editor preamble and postambles
compare_dist_histogram()
Sanity check plots comparing newly created distributions vs NONMEM dataset (or databases)
convert_to_plotly_watermark()
Converts a ggplot object to plotly object and then apply watermark, and other options
create_alert()
Function that generates a shinyalert
create_facet_label()
Function that combines multiple columns to create a new one that contains the facet labels
create_value_box()
Short-hand for creating NCA metrics valueBoxes
do_data_page_ind_plot()
Individual Plot for Data Exploration
do_data_page_plot()
Quick Plot for Data Exploration
drawDetails(<watermark>)
Auxillary function for watermark in ggplot (S3method?)
draw_correlation_plot()
Draw a correlation plot from a NONMEM-formatted dataset
eval_parse()
Short-hand function to eval, and then parse a string
expand_addl_ii()
Expand ADDL and II dosing rows
exposures_table()
Function to calculate exposures from IIV output
extract_matrix()
Function to output a matrix from mrgsolve model object
extract_model_params()
Function to extract params from model object
general_warning_modal()
Creates a general warning modal
generate_dosing_regimens()
Generate Dosing Regimens
generate_log_breaks()
Generating log breaks and axis labels, mainly for plotly
gm_mean()
Geometric mean
gm_mean_cv()
Geometric mean CV %
lm_eqn()
Linear regression text (for plotly)
lm_eqn_old()
Linear regression text (not used)
lowerFn()
Function to support draw_correlation_plot
ls_all()
List All Objects
model_code_2cmt_MM_TMDD
MM approximation of TMDD, see Dua et al (2015) https://doi.org/10.1002/psp4.41
model_code_2cmt_QE_TMDD
QE approximation of TMDD, see Dua et al (2015) https://doi.org/10.1002/psp4.41
model_examples_list
List of template models available for all users
model_switch_conditions()
shorthand function to switch model code based on choice of model input, and append model name
nhanes.filtered
NHANES 1999-2020 (pre-pandemic, until March 2020, pre-pandemic (https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nchs/nhanes/Default.aspx) ID, WT, SEX, AGEYR are retained by default. Insert citation notes here in the future
pct_above_y_at_x()
Function that calculates % of population > Y-value at a given X-value
pd_gompertz_effect
PD model of gemcitabine, with gompertz and effect compartment Tham LS, Holford NH, Wang L, Soo RA, Lee SC, Lee HS, et al. A pharmacodynamic model for the time course of tumor shrinkage by gemcitabine + carboplatin in non-small cell lung cancer patients. Clin Cancer Res. 2008;14(13):4213-8.
pdfNCA_wm()
Modified ncar::pdfNCA to support watermarks
pk_adaptive_dosing_int
Adaptive dosing interval example from mrgsolve v1.4.1 https://mrgsolve.org/blog/posts/2024-new-1-4-0-evtools.html#update-the-dose-regimen
pk_par_first_order
Parallel zero and first order absorption model Adapted from https://github.com/mrgsolve/gallery/blob/master/absorption/parallel.md
pk_seq_first_order
Sequential zero and first order absorption model (by Jinju Guk)
pknca_table()
Function to calculate summary statistics from simulated output
pkpd_adaptive_dosing
Adaptive dosing regimen example from mrgsolve v1.4.1 https://mrgsolve.org/blog/posts/2024-new-1-4-0-evtools.html#update-the-dose-regimen
plot_data_with_nm()
Main plot for Simulation tab
plot_iiv_data_with_nm()
Function to plot variability data
plot_iiv_exp_data()
Function to plot variability exposure data
plot_three_data_with_nm()
Main function for the plot in Parameter Sensitivity Analysis
print_cov_plot()
Prints distribution of a custom covariate
print_demog_plots()
Print demographics plots.
quantile_output()
Creates upper and lower percentiles by TIME for a given dataset
quantile_ranges_name()
Function that stores the names and ranges of quantiles as a character string to be used in Figure footnotes etc (Not used)
quantize()
Used for dividing bins for median line plots
reconstruct_matrices()
Converts a matrix object into a list
run_mvp()
Launch Model Visualization Platform App
run_single_sim()
Executes a mrgsim call based on user input

purrr:safely wrappers for various functions

purrr:safely wrappers for various functions

expects numeric as input, and cleans it

Function to improve default x-axis breaks
split_data_frame()
Function to split dataframes into roughly equal portions to facilitate distribution to each core

Modified NonCompart::tblNCA to support progress bars
today_numeric()
Get today's date as YYYYMMDD as seed input
trim_columns()
Trim columns to only retain essential columns for plotting
update_model_choices()
Shorthand function to update list of models and default values by input password

Function to update model object

Function that adds on to the an existing bsPopover such that the tooltip persists after updateSelectInput etc
